attributes.action: Launch an investigation into the spike in cardiac episodes in footballers in UK
attributes.background: Following on from an alarming increase in cardiac episodes amongst FIFA registered footballers, we demand an investigation into why these are occurring and how many of these were vaccinated against COVID-19.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The health and safety of football players is a matter for their managers and coaches, not the Government or Parliament.

We also couldn't open a petition that made unsubstantiated implications that ill health of footballers was the result of vaccination against Covid-19.
